import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import backgroundImg from '../assets/background.png'; import staticsImage from '../assets/statics-image.png'; import joinImage from '../assets/join-team.png'; import { FaFileAlt, FaBookOpen, FaUniversity, FaClipboardList, FaBrain, FaChalkboardTeacher, FaRegFilePdf, FaStar, FaLightbulb, FaQuoteRight, FaMobileAlt, FaRocket, FaGlobe, FaFolderOpen, FaEnvelope } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Home = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to ARMS Portal

Academic Resource Management System for Students and Faculty

{/* About Section */}

What is ARMS?

ARMS is a centralized platform to manage and access academic resources like notes, syllabi, and previous year question papers from multiple universities.

{/* Features Section */}

Features We Provide

{[ { title: 'Notes', desc: 'Upload and access semester-wise notes in PDF format.', icon: }, { title: 'Syllabus', desc: 'Explore and update academic syllabi for all departments.', icon: }, { title: 'Question Papers', desc: 'Access past university question papers for all years.', icon: }, { title: 'Academic Resources', desc: 'Centralized access to all learning materials.', icon: }, { title: 'Exam Preparations', desc: 'Tools and papers to prepare efficiently.', icon: }, { title: 'University Details', desc: 'Manage university profiles and content.', icon: }, { title: 'Courses Details', desc: 'Course and semester-wise structure & data.', icon: } ].map((f, i) => (
{f.icon}

{f.title}

{f.desc}

))}
{/* Testimonials Section */}

Trusted By

{[ { quote: 'Thanks to ARMS Portal, finding study material has become 10x easier!', name: 'Ritika Mehta', role: 'Student - SPU Mandi' }, { quote: 'As a teacher, uploading and organizing resources is now a breeze.', name: 'Dr. Neha Sharma', role: 'Faculty - SPU Mandi' }, { quote: 'Multi-university management from one dashboard is a game changer.', name: 'System Admin', role: 'Academic Coordinator' } ].map((t, i) => (

“{t.quote}”

{t.name}
{t.role}
))}
{/* Statistics Section with Background Image */}
{/* Optional overlay for better text contrast */}

ARMS in Numbers

5+

Universities

35+

Courses

80+

Resources

30+

Books

{/* Why Choose ARMS Section */}

Why Choose ARMS?

Multi-University Access

Access resources from various universities all in one place.

Organized Material

All your notes, syllabi, and question papers are neatly categorized.

Mobile Friendly

Study and manage your academic material on the go.

Fast & Lightweight

Built for speed and performance for smooth user experience.

{/* Join Our Team Section */}
{/* Overlay for better text contrast */}

Want to Join Our Team?

We're always looking for passionate contributors, educators, developers, and students to be part of ARMS Portal. Collaborate with us and help improve academic access across universities.

team@armsportal.in
); }; export default Home;
